topic.title: WebTorrent projects in ZeroNet, did you see any?

https://webtorrent.io/

topic.title: Is it good for my hd to use the ZeroNet in my SSD disk or should I put it in my normal HDD?
Can we use ZeroNet to make a site where people share small files? like books...
topic.body: I was thinking that it would be really nice to have a site where people share books  :)

1_1Buq4fyG8B3MxAvs7h4bASyWbrKFxmg4CJ.body: how do I delete it from seeding sites? I clicked on it by mistake :S
perfect, it works. I didn't found the site before because it uses chinese chars in the <title> of the page. It's deleted now, thanks.
